label: Somatic & Biological Reality
definition: Body/nervous system, sensory gating, interoception, sleep, pain, rhythms.

label: Cognitive Architecture
definition: Inner narrative, beliefs, epistemology, attention, language/metaphors.

label: Emotional Landscape
definition: Emotional range, shame, defenses, projection/shadow, taboo.

label: Identity & Self
definition: Authenticity, roles, values, digital self, integration.

label: Relationships & Attachment
definition: Attachment, conflict, repair, family roles, micro-dynamics.

label: Agency, Behavior & Lifestyle
definition: Habits, avoidance, money psychology, crisis response, risk.

label: Existential & Temporal
definition: Meaning, time, regret, purpose, spirituality/values.

label: Developmental Origins
definition: Formative learning, family myths, early attachment templates, wounds.

label: Strengths & Resources
definition: Protective factors, skills, support, resilience, recovery.

label: Context, Culture & Systems
definition: Environment design, cultural scripts, constraints, access, systems.

label: Founder/Builder
definition: Owns a company/product; high ownership and uncertainty load.

label: Engineer/Technical
definition: Technical thinker; prefers systems, logic, precision.

label: Tech Lead/Architect
definition: Leads technical direction; high context-switching and responsibility.

label: Product/PM
definition: Roadmap/coordination role; high stakeholder and prioritization load.

label: Designer/Creative
definition: Creative producer; identity often tied to output and taste.

label: Executive Leader
definition: Org-wide accountability; strategy + people + risk decisions.

label: People Manager
definition: Manages humans; feedback, conflict, performance, care load.

label: Solopreneur
definition: One-person business; isolation + context overload.

label: Remote Worker
definition: Work-home boundary blur; social and rhythm vulnerabilities.

label: Modern Stoic
definition: Values agency, discipline, meaning, emotional mastery.

label: High Achiever
definition: Achievement-driven; risk of perfectionism and burnout.

label: High-Functioning Skeptic
definition: Skeptical of woo; wants evidence, structure, utility.

label: Burnout
definition: Chronic stress with depletion, cynicism, reduced efficacy.

label: Performance Slump
definition: Noticeable drop in output/quality or consistency.

label: New Role/Promotion
definition: Adjustment to new expectations/identity and competence gaps.

label: Volatility
definition: Rapid change/uncertainty; threat system frequently activated.

label: Layoffs/Job Loss
definition: Employment loss or fear of layoffs; stability threat.

label: Pivot/Identity Shift
definition: Major direction change in life/work; uncertainty + grief.

label: Active Conflict
definition: Ongoing relational/work conflict; repair is needed.

label: Breakup/Separation
definition: Romantic rupture or distancing; attachment alarm.

label: Grief/Loss
definition: Loss of person, role, health, future, or identity.

label: Isolation
definition: Low connection; loneliness, reduced co-regulation.

label: Caregiver Load
definition: Supporting family/others; emotional labor + time scarcity.

label: Health Scare
definition: Medical concern triggers threat response and priorities shift.

label: Move/Relocate
definition: Context shift; loss of routines and social anchors.

label: Decision Overload
definition: Too many decisions; executive fatigue and avoidance.

label: Clarity
definition: Reduce ambiguity; name the real problem and constraints.

label: Regulation
definition: Stabilize nervous system; widen window of tolerance.

label: Focus
definition: Increase sustained attention; protect deep work.

label: Recovery
definition: Rebuild baseline energy and resilience capacity.

label: Boundaries
definition: Set/hold limits; reduce leaks and resentment.

label: Confidence
definition: Increase self-trust and internal permission.

label: Decision Quality
definition: Improve choices under uncertainty; reduce regret loops.

label: Habit Change
definition: Shift behaviors; build cues, routines, identity alignment.

label: Intimacy
definition: Increase closeness, vulnerability, and secure connection.

label: Meaning
definition: Reconnect to values, purpose, awe, and narrative coherence.

label: Communication
definition: Speak needs, repair conflict, reduce misunderstanding.

label: Agency
definition: Move from passive to active stance; restore choice.

label: Anxiety
definition: Persistent worry, hyperarousal, anticipatory threat scanning.

label: Panic Spikes
definition: Acute surges of fear; breath/heart disruption.

label: Numbness
definition: Emotional shutdown, flatness, disconnection.

label: Irritability
definition: Low threshold for frustration; snappy responses.

label: Shame
definition: Self-condemnation, hiding, unworthiness, exposure fear.

label: Guilt
definition: Moral self-blame; worry about harm or failure.

label: Rumination
definition: Repetitive thinking loop; replaying scenarios.

label: Overthinking
definition: Analysis paralysis; excessive modeling of outcomes.

label: Procrastination
definition: Delay/avoidance of important tasks.

label: Decision Paralysis
definition: Stuck at choice points; fear of wrong move.

label: Sleep Issues
definition: Insomnia, early waking, non-restorative sleep.

label: Fatigue
definition: Low energy, exhaustion, reduced capacity.

label: Brain Fog
definition: Cognitive dullness; slow processing; forgetfulness.

label: Loneliness
definition: Painful sense of disconnection or unseen-ness.

label: Low Mood
definition: Sadness, heaviness, hopelessness tone.

label: Anger Spikes
definition: Sudden anger or rage; loss of control.

label: People-Pleasing
definition: Appeasing to avoid conflict/abandonment; self-erasure.

label: Control Compulsion
definition: Over-structuring to reduce uncertainty/anxiety.

label: Comparison Trap
definition: Self-worth swings based on others' status/metrics.

label: Dissociation
definition: Spacing out, unreality, memory gaps under stress.

label: Somatic Tension
definition: Jaw/neck/chest/gut tension; headaches; bracing.

label: Threat Response
definition: Fight/flight/freeze/fawn patterns driving behavior.

label: Avoidance Loop
definition: Short-term relief reinforces long-term stuckness.

label: Dopamine Seeking
definition: Seeking novelty/reward to escape discomfort or low mood.

label: Perfectionism
definition: Standards used as safety; fear-driven excellence.

label: Scarcity Script
definition: Core belief: not enough time/money/love; hoard/overwork.

label: Attachment Alarm
definition: Threat of abandonment triggers protest/withdraw behaviors.

label: Identity Fusion
definition: Self-worth fused with role/output/status.

label: Cognitive Distortion
definition: Catastrophizing, black-white, mind-reading, etc.

label: Rumination Engine
definition: Looping thought to gain certainty/control.

label: Shame Core
definition: Self as flawed; drives hiding, overcompensation, aggression.

label: Projection/Shadow
definition: Disowned traits seen in others; strong emotional reactions.

label: Suppression
definition: Feelings pushed down; leaks as irritability or numbness.

label: Shutdown
definition: Nervous system goes offline to survive overwhelm.

label: Hypervigilance
definition: Constant scanning for threat/criticism; tension, fatigue.

label: Conflict Avoidance
definition: Avoid repair to prevent discomfort; resentment builds.

label: Control Strategy
definition: Control used to manage anxiety/uncertainty.

label: Need Denial
definition: Needs minimized to avoid dependence or rejection.

label: External Validation
definition: Self-esteem outsourced to praise/metrics/likes.

label: Learned Helplessness
definition: Agency collapse after repeated failure/chaos.

label: Moral Injury
definition: Violation of values leaves guilt, cynicism, bitterness.

label: Grief Block
definition: Unprocessed grief shows up as numbness/overwork.

label: Somatic Dysregulation
definition: Window of tolerance narrow; body drives reactivity.

label: Decision Fatigue
definition: Depleted executive function leads to avoidance/impulsivity.

label: Self-Sabotage
definition: Protective behavior prevents risk/success; preserves identity.

label: Intimacy Avoidance
definition: Distance used to prevent vulnerability/shame exposure.

label: Fear of Success
definition: Success implies visibility/pressure; triggers avoidance.

label: Deep Work
definition: Ability to sustain focus without interruption.

label: Context Switching
definition: Frequent switching taxes cognition and mood.

label: Meeting Drain
definition: Social/cognitive depletion from meetings.

label: Decision Fatigue
definition: Choice overload reduces quality and agency.

label: Executive Function
definition: Planning, prioritizing, sequencing, initiation.

label: Overcommitment
definition: Saying yes beyond capacity; boundary issues.

label: Busywork
definition: Low-value tasks used to feel productive.

label: Impostor Pattern
definition: Fear of being exposed as incompetent; overwork.

label: Metrics Obsession
definition: Self-worth/strategy over-tied to numbers.

label: Creative Block
definition: Difficulty starting/finishing creative work.

label: Scope Creep
definition: Inflating commitments/products beyond necessity.

label: Late-Night Grind
definition: Work extends into sleep; recovery debt.

label: Recovery Deficit
definition: Insufficient rest; chronic depletion cycle.

label: Cognitive Load
definition: Too many open loops/tabs/tasks; RAM overload.

label: Delayed Start
definition: Trouble initiating tasks despite intention.

label: Feedback Avoidance
definition: Avoid feedback due to shame/identity threat.

label: Conflict Cost
definition: Unresolved conflict reduces performance bandwidth.

label: Goal Drift
definition: Losing north star; reactive work dominates.

label: Operating at Edge
definition: No buffer; fragile capacity; crises cascade.

label: Tool Overload
definition: Too many systems/apps; meta-work dominates.

label: Attachment Style
definition: Patterns of closeness, distance, security, protest.

label: Trust Default
definition: Baseline trust vs earned trust orientation.

label: Conflict Style
definition: Pursue/withdraw/freeze/fawn/attack tendencies.

label: Repair
definition: Ability to reconnect after rupture; apology and follow-through.

label: Boundary Leaks
definition: Weak boundaries cause resentment and overload.

label: People-Pleasing
definition: Self-suppression to keep connection/safety.

label: Avoidant Distance
definition: Creating space to reduce vulnerability.

label: Pursuer Chase
definition: Chasing closeness when anxious; escalating tension.

label: Lonely in a Room
definition: Feeling unseen even around others.

label: Emotional Labor
definition: Carrying relational management work.

label: Debt Ledger
definition: Keeping a mental tally of favors/imbalance.

label: Assertiveness
definition: Clear requests; saying no; naming needs.

label: Family Roles
definition: Hero/scapegoat/caretaker patterns and loyalty binds.

label: Chaos Normalization
definition: High baseline drama feels normal; calm feels unsafe.

label: Intimacy Safety
definition: Capacity for vulnerability and closeness.

label: Communication Breakdown
definition: Misalignment, mind-reading, avoidance of hard talks.

label: Betrayal Wound
definition: Trust fracture driving vigilance or withdrawal.

label: Co-Regulation
definition: Ability to regulate via safe others; mutual soothing.

label: Scroll Trance
definition: Autopilot scrolling; time loss; numbness.

label: Notification Threat
definition: Alerts trigger urgency, anxiety, and reactivity.

label: Tab Hoarding
definition: Many open tabs as anxiety RAM or aspirational identity.

label: Dopamine Loop
definition: Reward-seeking via apps/feeds; difficulty stopping.

label: Comparison Trap
definition: Status/achievement comparison via social platforms.

label: Identity Performance
definition: Curating persona; fear of judgment/visibility.

label: Late-Night Spiral
definition: Night scrolling worsens sleep and mood.

label: Productivity Porn
definition: Consuming optimization content instead of doing.

label: Tool Overload
definition: Too many apps/processes; meta-work.

label: Doomscroll
definition: Threat-heavy content; anxiety amplification.

label: Gaming Compulsion
definition: Escapism via games; time distortion.

label: Porn/Compulsion
definition: Compulsive sexual content use; shame/avoidance cycles.

label: Multitasking
definition: Split attention; reduced depth and calm.

label: Digital Boundaries
definition: Rules around screens; attention hygiene.

label: Sleep
definition: Sleep onset/maintenance, quality, schedule, restoration.

label: Rhythms
definition: Circadian patterns, timing, consistency of routines.

label: Caffeine/Nicotine
definition: Stimulant regulation patterns and costs.

label: Nutrition/Hydration
definition: Food and water impacting mood and cognition.

label: Movement
definition: Exercise as regulation and identity anchor.

label: Sensory Overload
definition: Textures/sounds/lights trigger irritability or shutdown.

label: Interoception
definition: Awareness of internal signals (hunger, tension, fatigue).

label: Breath Signature
definition: Breath changes under stress (holding, shallow, fast).

label: Posture of Safety
definition: Body posture shifts with safety vs judgment.

label: Pain Signal
definition: Pain interpretation and response patterns.

label: Tension Patterns
definition: Jaw/neck/gut bracing; chronic tightness.

label: Shutdown Tell
definition: Somatic signs preceding dissociation/shutdown.

label: Somatic Soothing
definition: Self-touch, tactile soothing, sensory regulation tools.

label: Fatigue/Recovery
definition: Energy budgeting; recovery practices and debt.

label: Ping
definition: Low intensity; safe opener; minimal vulnerability.

label: Scan
definition: Moderate; reveals patterns; some vulnerability.

label: Deep
definition: High; touches shame/attachment/identity; may be activating.

label: Exposure
definition: Very high; trauma-adjacent; use with strong safety container.

label: Clinical Intake
definition: Structured assessment-style questioning; may include risk checks.

label: Trauma Sensitive
definition: May activate trauma memory; require pacing and consent.

label: Panic Risk
definition: May provoke panic sensations; include grounding guidance.

label: Dissociation Risk
definition: May lead to shutdown; monitor somatic cues.

label: Self-Harm Check
definition: Use only in appropriate clinical contexts; include crisis resources.

label: Substance Sensitive
definition: Addiction/compulsion content; risk of shame spiral.

label: Relationship Volatile
definition: Couples questions that can escalate conflict if unsafe.

label: Medical Limits
definition: Health questions that require medical referral if alarming.

label: Solo Journal
definition: Designed for self-reflection writing.

label: Coaching 1:1
definition: Works in coaching/mentoring context.

label: Therapy 1:1
definition: Best used by clinicians; deeper formulation possible.

label: Couples
definition: Pairs/dyads; includes repair and attachment framing.

label: Group
definition: Small group facilitation; shared norms needed.

label: Team Workshop
definition: Team/leadership context; psychological safety required.

label: Card Deck
definition: Short, punchy question suitable for deck.
